patthana7.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana7.9:0.3_0: But this is the reason for speaking.
patthana7.9:1.1_2: By development, they shouldn’t give up By developing, and cultivating the all cases.
patthana7.9:2.1_0: They conveyed through one place and don’t gain unification of mind. ...”
